# RKazam

RKazam is an DBI-compliant interface to the hypothetical Kazam database.
It is intended to be used as boilerplate for new DBI backends.

## Installation

Install from GitHub via

    # install.packages("devtools")
    devtools::install_github(c("r-dbi/DBI", "r-dbi/RKazam"))

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please note that the ‘RKazam’ project is released with a [Contributor
Code of Conduct](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). By
contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

# Package index

## DBI methods

Implementations for generics defined in the DBI package.

- [`dbAppendTable(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbBegin(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbBind(`*`<KazamResult>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbClearResult(`*`<KazamResult>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbClearResult(`*`<KazamResultArrow>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbColumnInfo(`*`<KazamResult>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbCommit(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbConnect(`*`<KazamDriver>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbDataType(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbDataType(`*`<KazamDriver>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbDataType(`*`<KazamDriver>`*`,`*`<list>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbDisconnect(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbExistsTable(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`,`*`<character>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbFetchArrow(`*`<KazamResultArrow>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbFetch(`*`<KazamResult>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbGetInfo(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)

  [`dbGetStatement(`*`<KazamResult>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbHasCompleted(`*`<KazamResult>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)

  [`dbIsValid(`*`<KazamDriver>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbIsValid(`*`<KazamResult>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)
  [`dbListFields(`*`<KazamConnection>`*`,`*`<character>`*`)`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/DBI.md)

## Package documentation

- [`Kazam()`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/Kazam.md) : Kazam
  driver
- [`RKazam`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/RKazam-package.md)
  [`RKazam-package`](https://rkazam.r-dbi.org/reference/RKazam-package.md)
  : RKazam: Boilerplate for implementing a DBI back end
